entry.title: Russia Pummels Civilian Targets While Talks Make Scant Progress
entry.content: Ukrainian and Russian negotiators ended a third round of talks with little progress, while Ukraine’s military held fast along several fronts and Russia continued to shell cities and residential areas.

entry.title: Occupied Ukrainian Towns Want Russian Troops to 'Go Home'
entry.content: Russia’s soldiers, who were told they were on a mission to liberate a brotherly nation from neo-Nazi rulers, will now have to suppress the very people they are purporting to protect.
